Package model

Class Project

java.lang.Object
model.Project
public class Project extends Object
this class represents a Green SQA project.

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(String name, String clientName, Calendar initialDate, Calendar finalDate, double budget, Manager proyectsManager, Manager clientsManager)
      The constructor method.
      Parameters:
      name - : String the name of the project.
      clientName - : String the name of the client of GreenSQA.
      initialDate - : Calendar the planned start date of the project.
      finalDate - : Calendar the planned end date of the project.
      budget - : double the budget of the project.
      proyectsManager - : Manager the manager of the projects.
      clientsManager - : Manager the clients manager.

      : String the name of the project.

      : String the initial date formatted as a String.
      Throws:
      ParseException - if there is an error parsing the initial date.

    • getPhase

      public ProjectsPhase getPhase(int pos)
      this method consults the current status information of one of the phases.
      Parameters:
      pos - : int the position of the phase in the array of phases.
      Returns:
      : ProjectsPhase the instance of the ProjectsPhase class in that position.

    • getProjectsManager

      public Manager getProjectsManager()
      this method consults the current status information of the atributte projects manager
      Returns:
      : Manager the instance of the Manager class that represents the projects manager.

      Returns:
      : Manager the instance of the Manager class that represents the clients manager.

    • getActivePhase

      public int getActivePhase()
      This method returns the position in the array of phases of the current active phase.
      Returns:
      : int it returns -1 if there is no active phase or a number between [0,5] if there is an active phase.

    • getMaxPhases

      public int getMaxPhases()
      This method returns the maximun amount of phases that can be created on a project.
      Returns:
      : int the maximun amount of phases that can be created.

    • addPhase

      public void addPhase(ProjectsPhase phase)
      This method adds a new phase to the array of phases.
      Parameters:
      phase - : ProjectsPhase the phase that is going to be add.

    • getFirstValidPosition

      public int getFirstValidPosition()
      search in the array of phases if exists one valid position.
      Returns:
      :int the method returns -1 if the position does not exist, a number in [0, 5] if exist a valid position.

    • culminateActivePhase

      public String culminateActivePhase()
      This method culminates the current active phase in the project by changing their status and the approval status. Then, if there is one, it activates the next phase.
      Returns:
      : String a message indicating that is no active phase in the project or indicating the phases that has end.

    • sendCapsuleToPhase

      public String sendCapsuleToPhase(KnowledgeCapsule capsule)
      This method register a new capsule and sends it to the ProjectsPhase class
      Parameters:
      capsule - : KnoweledgeCapsule the new capsule.
      Returns:
      : String returns a message that indicates that the capsule has been registered.
